Room.Name: The Holy Order of the White Rose
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the garrison of young paladins aspiring to be knights.
Room.LongDescription: The path of the Paladin is difficult and trying. In order to advance in the ranks of the holy knights, you must show skill in defeating a knight of a level higher than you. The Gallant Warrior should enter the blue door, if you are ready to be tested. A Gallant Warrior, Second Class should enter the green door when you are ready to advance to the next level.
